about_the_game:
Seed of Life is an old school action-adventure game set in a world of fantasy and magic.

When an army of machines suddenly threatens the natural order, the Seed of Life blooms, and its power is unleashed. You play as Hope, a spirit of the Seed in the shape of a grey wolf. On your quest to restore balance to Nature, you will be accompanied by an unexpected friend, a bluebird named Letty.

Together, you will explore picturesque places filled with mystery, fight formidable foes, and uncover secrets hidden throughout the world. Discover new abilities that will allow you to progress further. Re-experience a brand new old school adventure, that'll take you 20 years back.

Features


  • Alternate between Hope the wolf, and Letty the bird, and use their distinct skills to progress.
  • Explore various picturesque areas, and discover their secrets.
  • Fight and destroy the machines that stand in your way, even the biggest ones.
  • Solve puzzles, uncover mysteries, and interact with curious mechanisms to open the way.
  • Unlock new abilities that will allow you to discover new locations.
  • Follow a story centered around faith, meaning, and philanthropy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2310 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 11800H or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
